OD: For /v2/cardVerification, if apiKey or signture is wrong, return NE0100
For /v2/cardVerification, if miss parameter carddata in request body, return NE1177
For /v2/cardVerification, if cybs card is used for payment and missing either channelType or paymentMethod in request body, return NE0101
For /v2/cardVerification, if gmo card is used for payment and missing either channelType or paymentMethod in request body, return NE0101
For /v2/cardVerification, if mpgs card is used for payment and missing either channelType or paymentMethod in request body, return NE0101
For /v2/cardVerification, if mpgs card is used for payment and missing either channelId or paymentMethod in request body, return NE0101
For /v2/cardVerification, if unionpay expresspay is used for payment and missing either channelType or paymentMethod in request body, return NE0101
For /v2/cardVerification, if have channelType, paymentMethod or channelId in request body, when there is no configuration in processors_config table, return NE0101

conditionStrings: processor = 'cybs' and payment_method = 'card' and currency='CNY' and merchant_id='NTT_V2_AUTO'

OD: For /v2/cardVerification, if have channelType, paymentMethod or channelId in request body, when have valid configuration, return success without tokenization
For /v2/cardVerification, if have no channelType, paymentMethod or channelId in request body, when have no valid configuration in smart_routing table, return NE0101
For /v2/cardVerification, if have no channelType, paymentMethod or channelId in request body and have valid configuration, when miss parameter transactionCurrency, return NE1192

For /v2/cardVerification, if have no channelType, paymentMethod or channelId in request body and have valid configuration, but parameter transactionCurrency is invalid(like dsadasdasdasdasd), return NE1207
For /v2/cardVerification, if gmo cvs is used for payment, when payment method cannot found in card_verification_config table, return NE0101
For /v2/cardVerification, if mpgs card is used for payment, when payment method cannot found in card_verification_config table, return NE0101
For /v2/cardVerification, if unionpay securepay is used for payment, when payment method cannot found in card_verification_config table, return NE0101
For /v2/cardVerification, if cybs non 3ds card is used for payment and parameter isStoreToken is 'false', when have valid configuration, return success without tokenization
For /v2/cardVerification, if cybs non 3ds card is used for payment and parameter isStoreToken is 'true', when have valid configuration, return success with tokenization
For /v2/cardVerification,if gmo card is used for payment and parameter isStoreToken is 'false', when have valid configuration, return success without tokenization
GMO - Card - CardVerification - isStoreToken
For /v2/cardVerification, if mpgs non-3ds card is used for payment and parameter isStoreToken is 'false', when have valid configuration, return success without tokenization
For /v2/cardVerification, if mpgs non-3ds card is used for payment and parameter isStoreToken is 'true', when have valid configuration, return success with tokenization
For /v2/cardVerification, if unionpay expresspay is used for payment and parameter isStoreToken is 'false', when have valid configuration, return success without tokenization
For /v2/cardVerification, if unionpay expresspay is used for payment and parameter isStoreToken is 'true', when have valid configuration, return success with tokenization
For /v2/cardVerification, if alipay wap is used for payment, return NE0101
For /v2/cardVerification, if cybs non 3ds card is used for payment and parameterisAuthentication is 'true', it should ignore the isAuthentication parameter and return success
